siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Taliesin went in for his big surgery, so we talk about his cone of shame and that experience as a dog owner. Jon finally started watching Ted Lasso, so we can actually talk about it on the podcast. We also feature a milkshake review in this episode! From Frydae inâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Ted Lasso, Milkshakes, and Irrigation Systems
